## Pin Mapping
| Function                  | GPIO Pin |
|---------------------------|----------|
| Factory Reset Button      | IO02     |
| LD2420 RX                 | IO15     |
| LD2420 TX                 | IO16     |
| I2C SDA                   | IO17     |
| I2C SCL                   | IO18     |
| USB D+                    | IO19     |
| USB D-                    | IO20     |
| System LED                | IO09     |
| Accelerometer Interrupt   | IO10     |
| LD2420 Interrupt          | IO11     |
| Relay                     | IO12     |
| Charged Status            | IO14     |
| Power Good                | IO21     |
| Activity LED              | IO48     |
| SPL Microphone            | IO41     |
| Buzzer                    | IO40     |
